Literature.Title: Investigation of the role of tryptophan residues in cationic antimicrobial peptides to determine the mechanism of antimicrobial action.
Literature.Author: Bi X, Wang C, Ma L, Sun Y, Shang D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus AS1.72(MIC=2.50µM),Enterococcus faecalis CGMCC 1.595(MIC=1.56µM),Enterococcus faecium CGMCC 1.2334(MIC=2.50µM),Bacillus cereus AS1.126(MIC=5.0µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis CICC 23664(MIC=3.13µM),Escherichia coli AS1.349(MIC=2.50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.860(MIC=9.73µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae subsp. pneumoniae CGMCC 1.176(MIC=>100µM),Enterobacter cloacae CGMCC 1.58(MIC=>100µM),Proteus mirabilis CICC 22931(MIC=>100µM)
